alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 08 at 1:35PM MST until November 09 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting to 30 mph especially at mid and upper slopes. * WHERE...Borah Peak, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing and drifting snow are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Sun Valley Region
